title: VA Design Project Coordinator
job_overview:
About the Role:
We’re looking for a highly organized and proactive Design Project Coordinator to support and manage the workflow of our in-house design team. This role is perfect for someone who can juggle multiple projects, keep everyone aligned, and ensure deadlines are met. You’ll be the main point of contact between our team and customers for design-related inquiries and also help maintain product information and purchase order lists.

Key Responsibilities:
-Serve as the primary contact for customer inquiries related to design work. 
-Manage and coordinate tasks for a team of five in-house designers.
-Lead design teaUpgrade to see actual infoetings every Monday and Friday to plan and review weekly priorities.
-Create, maintain, and distribute task lists for the design team based on project needs.
-Monitor project timelines and ensure deliverables are completed on schedule.
-Organize and maintain internal product and purchase order information.
-Support process improvements and help streamline team communication and task management.

Requirements:
-Strong organizational and time-management skills.
-Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
-Experience in project coordination or team management is preferred.
-Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment.
-Prior experience in a design or creative environment is a plus.
